name: All Good Kings Must Come to an End
name_original: All Good Kings Must Come to an End
description:
The worlds first Deck-Building FPS Point n' Click game with RPG-elements.

The king has ruled for many years and peace has fallen upon the the land.  Armed with an ever-expanding deck of cards, you vow to take his place, ruling the kingdom as you see fit.

Controls:

wasd - move

space - draw card from deck

drag and drop - use cards

You start with an empty deck - walk into new cards to pick them up.
